title: Named Tuple
text: Named tuple is a very handy special python structure that creates tuples with keys

title: First order functions and closures
text: First order functions and closures are required when we want to pass functions as variables. This blog will describe their functionality and provide some examples

title: Dunders
text: Dunders also known as special methods and double unders. These methods are extreemly useful for building compact and readable classes by using predefined capabilities provided by the language features

title: Constructing Classes
text: Constructing classes properly is one of the most basic and required actions in programming. In this blog we will review some pythonic concepts for classes constructions, and see how to make our classes better.

title: Dependencies Management
text: Managing dependencies in Python is very important. It is required to have at least basic understanding of virtual environment, pip and activation. This blog will briefly review all these concepts and more.

title: Decorators
text: Constructing classes properly is one of the most basic and required actions in programming. In this blog we will review some pythonic concepts for classes constructions, and see how to make our classes better.
